description: This Java source file defines the MainActivity class for an Android app. It sets up the main user interface with a ViewPager2 for swiping between pages, a BottomNavigationView for navigation, and a FloatingActionButton for creating new notes. The class manages navigation synchronization and starts NoteEditActivity on FAB click.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity managing the app's primary user interface with navigation components and a FAB for creating new notes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, navigation behavior, and FAB click handling.
